ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wierd...around here all we get accused of is sucking off exp if we are careful not to overaggro, which is 2, maybe 3 nukes per mob. Now I ve seen a few groups
ygData.messageBody:
Wierd...around here all we get accused of is sucking off exp if we are careful not to overaggro, which is 2, maybe 3 nukes per mob. Now I've seen a few groups that could appreciate wizards, but most would rather have a rogue or mage. As for running...only til you get Root :-)
----- Original Message -----
From: Orion
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 4:01 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?

Maybe you are talking to the wrong people. Me and everyone I know welcome Wizards anytime they want to join. As long as they know what they are doing that is. Don't overdo it and pull agro then run around like a chicken with its head cut off so the warrior can't catch up and pull agro off of ya,etc....:>
 
----- Original Message -----
From: The Mad Macinchaote
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 1:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?

Ppl don't group with wizards bc they're seen as useless, so yes it does affect me. I practically have to beg to get any sort of a pickup group.
----- Original Message -----
From: naslund19@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 12:52 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?

> From: "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@...>
>
> This is the second huge wizard nerf...cut it out,
Verant!

It's not even a minor nerf.  The ONLY people it really
effects are the "Team manaburn" wizzys nuking Kunark
dragons to death for their scales.  Outside of that,
it's harmless.


> As it is neither of my wizzies (Valynn, 46, Nameless,
> Mysticka, 17, Rodcet Nife) can find anything but >
a "pity group" from my guild. First you made us useless
> below 35 with the massive resist nerfs so we can't ?
>land a spell, and now this?

First off, if you can't find anything but a "pity group"
from your guild, that's a guild problem, not a game or
class problem.

Second, it doesn't affect you.  Hell, it doesn't affect
anything but a very small percentage of raids or
encounters anyway.
